At the DLD tech conference in Munich, outgoing Google CEO Eric Schmidt said that his company would be hiring over 1,000 new staff members in Europe over the coming year, including several hundred in a research and development center in Munich. He added that the new employees would be split equally between developers and sales staff. Before joining Google a decade ago, Eric Schmidt served as an exec at computer networking maker Novell( NOVL) and Sun Microsystems, which is now owned by Oracle( ORCL). My estimate is that Eric Schmidt likes to be in the game. He likes to be a player, said Roger Kay . It's unlikely Eric Schmidt will retire with his billions, taking up sailing or traveling. Indeed, there's a rumor he's trying to land a gig on cable television.

Chris Bryant, who believes he may have been a victim of the phone hackers, said Friday he welcomed the decision to re-examine the case, adding that it should not have been closed last month. The evidence that this goes far deeper than one rotten apple has continued to stack up, and so a fresh pair of eyes looking at the case is very welcome, he said. Bryant said the police had`` severely'' damaged their credibility by failing to properly investigate earlier. Andy Coulson and the News of The World have denied the charges. The

Under the leadership of Eric Schmidt , Google has branched into several new markets such as mobile devices with its Android operating system and the enterprise market with Google Apps. The company certainly hasn't been resting on its laurels, said Davis. During his time at the company, Eric Schmidt has amassed 9.2 million Google shares, worth$ 5.8 bn.
